text: int main ( ) { int t , n , s = 0 , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { s = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ 100 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( i == ( n - 1 ) ) { s += a [ i ] [ 1 ] ; break ; } else { s += a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; break ; } } printf ( "%d" , s ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; }
